description: Grassy-leaved sweet flag (Acorus gramineus 'Ogon') is an amazing plant with a multitude of uses. It has bright yellow-green, sword-shaped foliage that is suitable for a variety of settings, be it the garden, or outdoor containers. It has a pleasant grassy scent, and can act as a natural mosquito repellent. Plant in full sun or part shade and watch it grow. It is a great ground cover and can also thrive as an attractive pond edge plant. Hardy and low maintenance, this is a versatile and beneficial plant, perfect for any garden!
